definitions.definition: A person directly involved in a creative marketing process.
Artistic material used in advertising, e.g. photographs, drawings, or video.
examples: The design team has completed the creative for next month's multi-part ad campaign.
I've included in my portfolio all the creative I've completed in my five year design career.

main_definition: ( countable ) A person directly involved in a creative marketing process.
secondary_definitions: ( uncountable ) Artistic material used in advertising, e.g. photographs, drawings, or video.
